name: FoodTopLab
description:
Healthy food makes you smaller, bad ones, make you bigger. Get too big and game is over (ESCAPE to quit)

Get too small, and you can't go where you want. Reset by running over the fridge that spawns the food and you'll get back to normal weight. But. Fridge will disappear. You can switch camera to see entire level by pressing "E" and thus, food will start moving around (not looking for you, just living like a toy) and stop as soon as you get back in control over your character.

Oh, and same for platforms, don't ask why. Yet.

Pick wisely between, having the maximum food (score) eaten, and being able to get back to the ending with the required amount of healthy food in the belly!

Made with UE5, pure UE::C++ (except for few actors, and UI elements)
